name: wmedits2surf
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.

inputs.description: Output will be on self instead of fsaverage.
inputs.name: Output on self

inputs.description: Do not cleanup temporary files after execution.
inputs.name: No Cleanup

inputs.description: Do not compute surfaces, only count stats.
inputs.name: No Surfaces

output-files.description: Left hemisphere white matter erase surface file.
output-files.name: LH WM Erase Surface

output-files.description: Right hemisphere white matter erase surface file.
output-files.name: RH WM Erase Surface

output-files.description: Left hemisphere white matter fill surface file.
output-files.name: LH WM Fill Surface

output-files.description: Right hemisphere white matter fill surface file.
output-files.name: RH WM Fill Surface

output-files.description: Statistics on the number of voxels erased.
output-files.name: WM Erase Stats

output-files.description: Statistics on the number of voxels filled.
output-files.name: WM Fill Stats
